text: The Invisible Plane (commonly known as the Invisible Jet) is a fictional plane appearing in American comic books published by DC Comics, commonly used by superheroine Wonder Woman as a mode of transport. Created by William Moulton Marston as an allegory for the feminine compliance reaction that women of the Depression relied on to safely traverse the male dominated work place, it first appeared in Sensation Comics #1 (Jan. 1942). == In other media == The plane has appeared in toys, movies, television series, and video games as well. Category:DC Comics superheroes
title: Invisible Plane
